readable.title: 3097171315_0ba7d283b1
readable.content: a group of people are congregated in a room by a big round mirror . A group of people enter a fancy golden living room . A group of people mills about in a room with crystal chandelier , a brown leather couch and a large round mirror . A group of people stand in a fancily decorated room . The people are gathered in a room with a sofa , round mirror , and chandelier .
